channel.title: England World on
channel.description: Recent content in England World on

item.title: Proper English
item.description: It’s the House Party from Hell, and the first time I read it, I was like this is exhausting, it’s claustrophobic, not sure I can vibe with it—but then I read it again in 2020 and YES. It is a MOOD.

item.title: Think of England
item.description: This is pulp with all the trappings—daring spies, dastardly villains, plots galore—and yet it’s so grounded in real emotion it hardly feels like pulp at all. Except for the part that’s so entertaining I devoured it in two days. Great book. Great pairing. KJ Charles does it again.
